text: I‚Äôve been following up with Dr Wee for my collarbone injury since last year November and I truly appreciate the excellent care he provided. From the start, the diagnosis was clear and thorough, giving me confidence in the recovery process. Dr Wee took the time to explain my condition, answered all my questions and assured me that surgery was not necessary, which was a great relief. Thanks for his guidance and advice, my recovery has been progressing well üòÅüëçüèª

Had a fall in Aug 2024. I met Dr Alvin for a consultation a few days after.  After meeting him, within the same week of the fall I already know I had Ligament tear. Due to work etc, planned the surgery at Alvernia in Dec 2024. So of course, I had the most princess treatment ever! I truly recommend seeing Dr Alvin if you have any type of orthopedic issues. He is knowledgeable, kind, expertise in his work and will take care of you very well! Within 3 months I can walk well and of course with physio (another amazing princess treatment) I managed to gain strength and slowly begin to gain strength in my knee. Thank you Dr Alvin and team for looking after my being and my knee!

P/s: the scar gel the clinic recommended is so amazing! I can hardly see the scar !! Just the big one. You could hardly see the other two #superlove

Dr Wee is what I would call a good doctor who is committed to his work. He treated and operated successfully on my right shoulder for a reverse shoulder arthroplasty. He handled the whole process professionally & answered all my questions satisfactorily. A man with few words, but he showed that he is humble , sincere & caring. I will not hesitate to recommend anyone who needs his help. I wish him well & that he will continue to do his excellent work serving the community.

A very pleasant and professional, helpful, understanding and friendly doctor . Also had a great team of nurses and clinical staff that is helpful and friendly. I am thankful for the positive impact Dr Alvin have made through his expertise and compassionate care
Dr Andy Wee is very experienced, and one of the best in Singapore for shoulder related injuries. Communicates and explains well, with great surgical outcomes! Would definitely recommend!
